snippet.title: Pillow Fight - A deckbuilding game about sleep!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://jontopielski.itch.io/pillow-fight?ac=qfCyYFQF-tw?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt A game about sleep

- build your own "abilities" deck
- counting sheep combat system
- 3 difficulty modes

➡️ More from Jon Topielski https://jontopielski.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More deck-building games https://itch.io/games/tag-deck-building?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
